item.title: Academic Library Management Done Right
item.description: It is really useful to keep a central place where you put all interesting things you find on the internet like Books, Websites, Articles, … . For me this central place is Zotero. How my library is organized I like keeping four sublibraries for textbooks my own calculations, transcripts and reviews papers, articles, theses and similar websites in which I don’t have any further ordering. Adding a new entry The feature I like most about Zotero is the Zotero Connector.

item.title: How To: This Website
item.description: I have been searching long and wide for an easy to make and easy to maintain website. Most things sucked until I found out about R Markdown Websites. You basically write your content in markdown and then R Markdown handles everything for you. It was certainly a way to do it and for everyone who wants to try I can recommend: Nick Strayer Robert Mitchell There were however some issues that bothered me.
